name: Energize Schools
description: Engaging, inspiring, and empowering K-12 students to become environmental leaders in their communities, green their facilities, and conserve resources through hands-on learning.
fullDescription: Engaging, inspiring, and empowering K-12 students to become environmental leaders in their communities, green their facilities, and conserve resources through hands-on learning.
whatTheyOffer: Engaging, inspiring, and empowering K-12 students to become environmental leaders in their communities, green their facilities, and conserve resources through hands-on learning.
howToGetIt: Applications are for school participation. Individuals apply via their school.
address: 100 Smith Ranch Road, San Rafael, CA, 94903
